about.title: Hey, I'm <name>Adrian</name>
about.description: +1 year of experience. <career>Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer</career> from Seville, Spain ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸. Specialized in the development of <unique>unique</unique> web and mobile applications.

first.description: I worked on the maintenance and continuous improvement of a web application for public administrations used by thousands of users. I collaborated with a development team to develop the tasks.

second.description: I led the complete development, both backend and frontend, of a mobile application with React Native for the organization of football matches that has more than 700 active users.

third.description: I started as a full-time developer, participating in internal and external projects and leading the migration of legacy code. This experience strengthened my technical foundations and my ability to work in agile teams.

fourth.description: As a freelance developer, I collaborate with companies and entrepreneurs creating custom digital solutions. I design web applications, automate processes and provide technical consulting aligned with their business objectives.

first.name: Golgorio - Soccer matches organization app
first.description: Mobile application to organize football matches in Seville and find teams to compete against. Created from scratch using Expo and used by +700 users and +20 courts to book.

second.name: Memify - Meme creation platform
second.description: Open-source web platform that allows the quick creation of memes from templates provided by R2. Different plans with payment gateway implemented with Stripe. User authentication. Designed with Figma.

third.name: Mariwano - Multipurpose Discord bot
third.description: Open-source Discord bot focused on entertaining users. Used by multiple servers. Various functionalities such as moderation, music playback, meme creation, and much more.

contact.title: I'm always open to new opportunities and projects
